item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Finland announces migration of its rail network to international gauge (181 points | 134 comments)
2. Making Video Games (Without an Engine) in 2025 (180 points | 77 comments)
3. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (449 points | 109 comments)
4. The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source (1345 points | 892 comments)
5. The Behavior of LLMs in Hiring Decisions: Systemic Biases in Candidate Selection (10 points | discuss)
6. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (583 points | 186 comments)
7. I got fooled by AI-for-science hype–here's what it taught me (166 points | 114 comments)
8. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (345 points | 137 comments)
9. What are people doing? Live-ish estimates based on global population dynamics (153 points | 66 comments)
10. Zod 4 (710 points | 206 comments)
11. Questioning Representational Optimism in Deep Learning (19 points | 2 comments)
12. GitHub Copilot Coding Agent (446 points | 265 comments)
13. A shower thought turned into a Collatz visualization (111 points | 18 comments)
14. The Entropy of Thought: Why Our Minds Gravitate Toward Divided Realities (14 points | 2 comments)
15. Claude Code SDK (349 points | 158 comments)
16. Launch HN: Better Auth (YC X25) – Authentication Framework for TypeScript (216 points | 83 comments)
17. Ann, the Small Annotation Server (43 points | 6 comments)
18. Run GitHub Actions locally (238 points | 97 comments)
19. Biff – a batteries-included web framework for Clojure (41 points | 6 comments)
20. Kilo: A text editor in less than 1000 LOC with syntax highlight and search (145 points | 22 comments)
21. Solving physics-based initial value problems with unsupervised machine learning (10 points | 3 comments)
22. Game theory illustrated by an animated cartoon game (296 points | 47 comments)
23. A man who visited every country in the world without boarding a plane (2023) (59 points | 28 comments)
24. Precomputing Transparency Order in 3D (3 points | discuss)
25. The forbidden railway: Vienna-Pyongyang (2008) (196 points | 66 comments)
26. Terraform MCP Server (78 points | 17 comments)
27. Memory Consistency Models: A Tutorial (43 points | 2 comments)
28. Remarks on AI from NZ (160 points | 86 comments)
29. xAI's Grok 3 comes to Microsoft Azure (137 points | 146 comments)
30. Too Much Go Misdirection (177 points | 82 comments)
